title: Tasty Grilled Chicken Salad With Ranch Dressing Recipe
content:
Creamy and flavourful dressing made using mayo and buttermilk. This dressing tastes amazing with plain iceberg lettuce or over any salad.

A delicious salad made using lettuce and chicken. The salad gets a new dimension of taste with homemade ranch dressing. This plate of chicken salad taste so delicious and is very easy to make as well.

 

Grilled Chicken Salad with Ranch Dressing

Prep time: 5 mins

Total time: 5 mins

 

Recipe type: Salad

Cuisine: American

Serves: 1 serving

 

Ingredients

Lettuce - as needed

Tomato - 1 cubed

Cucumber - ¼ cup cubed

Bell Pepper - ¼ cup cubed

Grilled Chicken as needed

Homemade Ranch Dressing as needed

 

Instructions

Take everything on a serving plate.

Pour dressing over.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Masala Roast ( Street Food Style ) Recipe
recommendations.content:
Really spicy and lip-smackingly delicious street food style chicken masala roast. This taste so yummy with either roti, paratha or chapati.

recommendations.title: Tasty Palakkad Chicken Curry Recipe
recommendations.content:
Super simple but delicious chicken curry made Palakkad style using shallots, onions and fresh masala. This deep coloured chicken curry not only tastes amazing but is easy to make as well.

recommendations.title: Tasty Black Pepper Chicken Fry Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious juicy and crispy black pepper chicken fry which tastes amazing. You can serve it as a side or as an appetizer for any parties.
 
Black pepper chicken fry recipe
 
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 10 mins
Total time: 20 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
